HediffDef.label: Pyschic assistant
HediffDef.description: Installed assistant that assists the core intelligence. This organic assistant is highly psychically attuned, acting as a conduit for the core intelligence to utilize psychic capabilities. Due to the organic nature of the assistant, the core intelligence is unable to fully manipulate it like other parts, and is vulnerable to all that which comes with psychic sensitivity. The assistant consumes a vast amount of energy to sustain itself, leading to greater power consumption overall.

HediffDef.label: Evolving AI
HediffDef.description: Installed sapient intelligence that interacts with the core intelligence. This assistant is fully sapient, and will grow wiser and more harmonious with the core intelligence over time. As the sub-intelligence is housed within an archotech chip, its intelligence will likely one day exceed its host's. Curiously, this does not seem to bother the captured intelligence. Perhaps it prefers being away from the world. Perhaps it's not truly constrained here at all.

ThingDef.label: Archotech sapient assistant
ThingDef.description: This curious device is completely inert when not installed. When it is installed, an infantile intelligence is created that interacts with the core intelligence. This assistant is fully sapient, and will grow wiser and more harmonious with the core intelligence over time. As the sub-intelligence is housed within an archotech chip, its intelligence will likely one day exceed its host's. Curiously, this does not seem to bother the captured intelligence. Perhaps it prefers being away from the world. Perhaps it's not truly constrained here at all. Indeed, if uninstalled, the intelligence simply vanishes. Where does it go?

RecipeDef.description: Installs a sapient assistant into the sub-core assistant slot of a unit. This archotech device seems to possess intelligence only when implanted in a mechanical unit. Where does it go when uninstalled?
